posts.post_content:
Some tougher cards among the few remaining.  Also, check my other post for raw T207s.  I'll package them all together to make a deal.

Almeida/Anon Fac.3 back - SGC10 - $100
Bodie/Recruit - PSA2 - SOLD
Cole/Recruit - SGC20 - $30
Chance/Recruit - SGC10 - $70
Gowdy/Recruit - SGCA - SOLD
O. Miller/Broadleaf- SGC20 - SOLD
Mike Mitchell/Recruit - PSA1.5 - $50
Cy Morgan/Napoleon - SGC40 - SOLD
Reulbach/Recruit - SGCA - $25
Weaver/Broadleaf - SGC10 - TRADED

I'm not entirely averse to trade offers, so don't be afraid to ask.  Contact me at [url]rnovak14@wi.rr.com[/url].  Emails only.  If you're serious, back scans are available for any and all.

Thanks for looking
Email sent on miller and bodie
